scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd packages/backend && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd packages/frontend && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run start
scripts.lint: cd packages/frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint && cd ../shared && npm run lint
